about_the_game:
From Dream to Reality - Dive into a world where imagination meets action! Embark on Archie's epic quest to rescue his parents, straight from the vivid dreams of Logan, our 7-year-old designer and artist. His hand-drawn doodles and playful daydreams have been brought to life, crafting a universe filled with charm, excitement, and pixelated nostalgia!



Skill-Based Gameplay with a Twist - Master Archie's acrobatic finesse to deftly navigate terrains. But here’s the kicker—introducing the Harvest Pulse System! As you conquer challenges and defeat enemies, gather energy pulses that supercharge Archie’s abilities, unlocking new maneuvers and surprising tactics to outsmart the baddies.



Vibrant Pixel-Art Paradise - Immerse yourself in the lush, visually stunning world of Pepper Pines, where every pixel is a brushstroke of creativity. From the shimmering streams to the shadowy depths of Rocky Road, each locale is bursting with detail, lovingly crafted from the limitless imagination of a 6-year-old and brought to life in pixelated perfection!



Precision Controls for Seamless Action - Feel the thrill of ultra-responsive mechanics as you execute wall jumps, glide down slopes, or deliver a perfectly timed uppercut. The smooth, precise controls ensure that every action feels natural and satisfying, pulling you deeper into Archie's daring mission.



Epic Storyline Unfolded - Traverse the vibrant realms of Pepper Pines and beyond in Archie's heart-pounding quest to save his family. Journey from the mystical forests of Pepper Pines to the cosmic reaches of outer space, unraveling a gripping narrative filled with unexpected twists, formidable foes, and legendary allies.



Power-Packed Upgrades - Amp up Archie's abilities with mind-blowing power-ups! Harness the Winged Wonder to zoom through the skies, navigate aerial mazes, and explore new heights. Or, unleash the Dustbuster to create a tornado of chaos, sweeping enemies off their feet. Discover an insanely cool mech, and other incredible tools to help you conquer the challenges that await in Pepper Pines!



Epic Boss Battles - Face off against formidable bosses that will test your skills and strategy. Whether you're dodging the ferocious dives of Ray, the rat of Hill Hopping, or outsmarting Crazy Guy, the multi-eyed mastermind of Cosmic Craft, each boss fight is a pulse-pounding experience. Engage with these villains, uncover their backstories, and dive deeper into the mysteries of Pepper Pines.

FAQs for Pigeon's Mission:

Is there a demo?
🚀 We're working on getting a demo ready for you! Stay tuned to our socials for updates, and be sure to wishlist us on Steam so you’re the first to know when it drops!

Who composed the music?
🎵 The incredible tunes in Pigeon's Mission were composed by a talented friend of the studio who loves creating catchy, atmospheric beats. We wanted something that matched Logan’s imaginative vibe, and we think the music does just that!

What were your inspirations?
🌟 Our biggest inspiration is Logan, the 6-year-old creator behind the game! His love for adventure, classic platformers, and his wild imagination fueled the entire development process. Think of a mix between the magic of Saturday morning cartoons and the thrill of discovering a hidden secret level in your favorite game!

How much RNG is in the game?
🎲 While there's some RNG to keep things exciting and unpredictable, we've made sure it's balanced to ensure the game remains fun and fair. Your skills will shine through, and the randomness just adds to the fun!

How long is the campaign?
🎮 The campaign is designed to be a fun, engaging adventure! Expect around 6-8 hours of gameplay, perfect for a weekend or a few after-school sessions.

Can I remap controls?
🕹️ Yes! We know everyone has their preferred way to play, so we’ve made sure you can remap the controls to suit your style.

Does it support 4K / Ultrawide monitors?
🔍 Absolutely! Pigeon's Mission is optimized for 4K and Ultrawide monitors so you can experience Logan's adventure in all its high-definition glory.

Does it run at 60 FPS?
🚀 Yes, Pigeon's Mission runs buttery smooth at 60 FPS, ensuring you get the best gameplay experience possible!

What engine did you build it in?
🛠️ Pigeon's Mission was built using the GameMaker engine. It gave us the tools we needed to bring Logan’s ideas to life with the vibrant and playful style we were aiming for.

Is there multiplayer or co-op?
👥 Right now, Pigeon's Mission is a single-player adventure. But who knows what the future holds? We’re always open to expanding the game if fans ask for it!

Any plans to support Linux / Mac?
💻 We're excited to confirm that Pigeon's Mission will support both Mac and PC at launch! Linux support is something we’re considering down the line, so stay tuned.

Will there be modding support?
🔧 Modding isn't supported at launch, but it's something we're keeping in mind for the future. We love the idea of players adding their own creative touch to the game!

Does it support controller / keyboard?
🎮 You bet! Pigeon's Mission supports both controller and keyboard setups, so you can play however you feel most comfortable.

When will it be released?
📅 We're aiming for a release window in Q1-Q2 2025. Make sure to wishlist us on Steam to stay updated on the exact date!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Maverick 10.9 or later
  • Processor: Apple Silicon and Intel
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible with all Mac GPUs
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Macbook, Macbook Pro or iMac 2012 or later
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Maverick 10.9 or later
  • Processor: Apple Silicon and Intel
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible with all Mac GPUs
  • Additional Notes: Macbook, Macbook Pro or iMac 2012 or later

name: Pigeon's Mission

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Windows: Intel i5+
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 450 GTS / Radeon HD 5750 or better
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Windows: Intel i5+
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 450 GTS / Radeon HD 7800 or better
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

reviews:
“Logan’s ideas are helping make Pigeon’s Mission look like it could be a heartwarming hit.”
GameMaker
short_description: Jump into a pixel-art adventure crafted by a 7-year-old’s ideas & sketches! Guide Archie through Pepper Pines as he unleashes clever attacks, fun power-ups, and the all-new Harvest Pulse System to collect golden seeds, power up, & save Archie's parents in this exciting & nostalgic journey.
